law.catch_line: Appointment Of Commissioner For Service Of Process; Manner Of Service
law.text: [ Text of section effective until August 1, 2012. Repealed by 2012, 106, Sec. 2. See 2012, 106, Sec. 9.] Whoever offers correspondence courses for a tuition charge or profit in the commonwealth shall be deemed to have appointed the commissioner his agent for service of process in any action against him arising out of transactions with residents of the commonwealth. Service of process shall be accomplished by personal service at the office of said commissioner and by sending a copy of the summons and complaint by registered mail to the last known address of the defendant.
